QuestData.Title: Zhi-Zhi, the Dextrous
QuestData.Description: Upon the hills to my right, you will find a hozen named Zhi-Zhi. He, too, won enough sparring matches to move up the ranks. I think he will provide you with more of a challenge.$b$bChallenge him, and try to defeat him.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Fights with blinding speed and a less-than-blinding intellect.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Zhi-Zhi at the Tian Monastery.
QuestData.CompletionText: Zhi-Zhi's style is different than that of most pandaren monks. He and his kind tend to have more... energy... than us.
QuestData.RewardText: It appears that I must move you up the ranks yet again, $c.
